title: Spoon
description: Small, pointed oval gilt bowl with rat-tail join on shaft with continuing engraved line ending in oval outline at base of handle that is engraved with double row of horizontal ovals continuing to engraved square with double outline. Reverse similar to 1996-106-1.
name: Spoon
